QuestData.Title: The Black Locus
QuestData.Description:
It really is quite enticing, isn't it? The Locus was too much for the Sundered Flame. However, it fits just right in my hands. Funny, that.
<Adenedal shakes his head.>
Perhaps not. Not this day. Not again. Take it from me. It is not my burden to bear.
Good bye, dear friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Black Locus to the Telemancer Aerilyn.
QuestData.RewardText:
This was found at the Nelthazan Ruins? Fascinating.
Its markings are ancient, but they bear a resemblance to other artifacts we have discovered in and around the ancient machinations of Deathwing.
Further study is necessary.
